aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: Know me
aboutMe.description: I am a passionate web developer, graduated in Systems Engineering from EAFIT University. After two years at Perficient, I decided to venture into freelancing. In addition to my work as a developer, I am the founder of ContArte, a project dedicated to promoting emerging art through various platforms, where I also lead a podcast. Outside of work, I excel as a high-performance hockey player and enjoy anime, movies, books, and music. My mission is to create digital experiences that captivate and connect people on a deeper level, merging technology with creativity and passion.
aboutMe.advertisementHide: Do you want to know more about ContArte?
aboutMe.advertisementShow: Visit ContArte on our social media üêâ!
